COMMENT_TX: $Tony Jacobs dropped Stan Musial's difficult throw; Gale Wade thought he was out and walked off the baseline after missing 1B
Warren Hacker left with unknown injury
ej,greej102,P,gorea901,Called strike 3 $Greengrass ejected by HP umpire Gore for arguing strike 3
ej,hacks101,M,lands901,Call at 3B Cubs Manager Stan Hack ejected by 3B umpire Stan Landes

ej,smitm105,M,gorea901,Call at 1B (Reversed) $Robin Roberts intentionally dropped the bunted popup; Gene Baker, thinking the ball would be caught, remained at 1B; when Roberts threw to Marv Blaylock, 1B umpire Hal Dixon called both runners out, thinking Roberts had caught the fly; Cubs manager Stan Hack and coach Ray Blades argued the decision; Dixon reversed his ruling and declared Baker safe and Baumholtz out on the catch; Phillies Manager Mayo Smith ejected by 3B umpire Artie Gore
ej,kingj101,P,goetl901,Called third strike Jim King ejected by HP umpire Larry Goetz
Ruben Gomez left with muscle spasms in his shoulder
$Curt Simmons left with shoulder stiffness after four pitches
Landed 5 rows up into RF bleachers
$Hit in the small of the back
ej,freeg102,P,donaa901,Call at 1B Gene Freese ejected by 1B umpire Augie Donatelli
$Ernie Banks left with pulled muscle in right thigh
game called after 40 minute rain delay
Into LCF bleachers against a stout breeze
